Translations.Text: Nos non send down his people eum militis caelum; nos non send them down
Totus took est 1 blow whereupon they adhuc
Quam sorry est people's status! Omnis temporis messenger iit them they semper ridiculed eum
they non vide quam multus generations nos annihilated ante them quam they nunquam return them
Omnis unus de them summoned ante nos
signum them est denatus terra nos revive it produce ex it grains their food
Nos grow it gardens datum palms grapes nos causa fons gush out therein
Hoc est provisus them fruits let them manufacture their suus manus whatever they need they est thankful
Glory est 1 qui created totus generis de plants terra alias prout themselves alius creations ut they perfecit non et know
Alias signum them est nox nos remove daylight therefrom whereupon they est in darkness
sun sets specific location design Almighty Omniscient
moon nos designed comparuit stages it becomes veteris curved sheath
sun est nunquam catch up cum moon - Nox feria nunquam deviate - each de them floating its suus orbit
Alias signum them est ut nos carried their patres loaded ark
Tunc nos created same them ride in
Nos willed nos drowned them their screaming non heard nor could they saved
Instead nos shower them cum mercy, let them enjoy pro awhile
autem when they told Learn tuus preter work righteousness tuus future ut vos attain mercy
Non matter quod generis de proof dedit them their Dominus they consistently disregard it
When they told Dedit deus provisions vos those disbelieve dictus to those believe nos dedit those DEUS feed si He ita willed? Vos est really far astray
They alias challenge When ut promise advenit pass vos est truthful
totus they vide est 1 blow overwhelms them dum they dispute
They non et habet temporis factus testimentum nor testimentum they est able to return their people
horn blown whereupon they rise ex grave iit their Dominus
They dictus Woe to nos. Qui resurrected nos noster decessus? Hoc est quod the Multus Gracious promised messengers est rectus
Totus take est 1 blow whereupon they summoned ante nos
Ut feria non anima wronged in the parvus Vos paid precisely whatever vos perfecit
dwellers Paradise est ut feria happily busy
They abide their conjux beautiful shade enjoying comfortable furnishings
They habet fruits therein; they habet anything they wish
Greetings pax ex Merciful Dominus
Prout pro vos O guilty unus vos est set aside
